problem: 已知直线DE与不等边△ABC的两边AC,AB分别交于点D,E,若∠CAB=60°,则图中∠CDE+∠BED=()
comment: 此题考查三角形的内角和以及四边形的内角和为360°,注意结合图形,找出解决问题的方法
problem_en: It is known that the straight line DE and the two edges AC and AB of the inequality △ABC intersect at the vertices D and E respectively. If ∠CAB = N_0, then ∠CDE + ∠BED = ()
